articles.title: Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled against Falcons
articles.description:
DeMario Douglas had a career day. Drake Maye had a couple of shaky turnovers. The Falcons attacked Marcus Jones.

The post Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled against Falcons appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: DeMario Douglas achieved a career-high performance against the Falcons on November 2.
Drake Maye committed two turnovers, raising concerns for the Patriots' defense.
Marcus Jones faced significant challenges, impacting the team's defensive strategy moving forward.

articles.title: Shutdown stalemate set to drag into sixth week as Trump pushes Republicans to change Senate rules
articles.description:
With the two parties at a standstill, the shutdown, now in its 33rd day, appears likely become the longest in history.

The post Shutdown stalemate set to drag into sixth week as Trump pushes Republicans to change Senate rules appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Shutdown enters 33rd day, potentially becoming the longest in U.S. history.
Trump urges Republicans to alter Senate rules amid ongoing deadlock.
Boston residents face disruptions as federal services remain halted.

articles.title: Tariffs are Trump’s favorite foreign policy tool. The Supreme Court could change how he uses them.
articles.description:
This week, the Supreme Court hears arguments on whether the Republican president has overstepped federal law with many of his tariffs.

The post Tariffs are Trump’s favorite foreign policy tool. The Supreme Court could change how he uses them. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Supreme Court hears tariff arguments affecting Trump's trade policies this week.
Potential changes could impact Boston's local economy and businesses reliant on imports.
Ruling may redefine presidential power over tariffs, influencing future trade relations.
